backFields.label: Workshop Overview
backFields.value:
Comprehensive workshop on regenerative agriculture principles and practices.

Topics:
• Soil biology and carbon sequestration
• Composting and nutrient cycling
• Crop rotation and polyculture
• No-till farming techniques
• Water management and conservation
• Farm-to-market distribution models

Full-day workshop with hands-on demonstrations.
Lunch provided from local regenerative farms.

backFields.label: LIFT Priority Connection
backFields.value:
This learning event is offered to LIFT Certificate holders who selected 'Food & Farming' as a priority interest.

As a holder, you receive:
• Free access to priority learning events
• Farm visit opportunities
• Early access to agricultural investments
• Connections to local food producers
• Impact reports from funded projects

Your LIFT Certificate phase progression is enhanced by event participation.

locations.relevantText: Regenerative Agriculture Workshop at Bell Tower Hall starting at 10:00 AM
